snippet: The 90th birthday of a double agent from the height of the cold war who left Britain for Moscow has been made the occasion for extensive celebration in Russia.
abstract: Ninetieth birthday of George Blake, double agent from height of cold war who escaped Britain for Moscow, is occasion for extensive celebration in Russia; Blake has lived well and apparently happy on his Russian pension in cottage outside Moscow.
lead_paragraph: The 90th birthday of a double agent from the height of the cold war who left Britain for Moscow has been made the occasion for extensive celebration in Russia.

headline.seo: George Blake, British Double Agent, Turns 90 in Moscow
headline.main: Double Agent, Turning 90, Says, ‘I Am a Happy Person’
headline.print_headline: Double Agent, Turning 90, Says, ‘I Am a Happy Person’
